email_subject: Phillip, claim your Holiday gift today!
email_body: [IMAGE] [IMAGE] Phillip, thanks for being a valued iWon user! Click here to redeem your Lenox(r) Crystal Snowflake Ornaments. [IMAGE] [IMAGE] [IMAGE] [IMAGE] [IMAGE] [IMAGE] Shipping and handling charges apply. Forgot your member name? It is: PALLEN70 Forgot your iWon password? Click here. You received this email because when you registered at iWon you agreed to receive email from us. To unsubscribe from one or more email categories, please click below. Please note, changes may take up to one week to process. If you're not signed in, you will need to do so before you can update your profile. Click here.
